title: Up in the Air
writer: Walter Kirn (novel), Jason Reitman (screenplay), Sheldon Turner (screenplay)
actors: George Clooney, Vera Farmiga, Anna Kendrick, Jason Bateman
plot: With a job traveling around the country firing people, Ryan Bingham enjoys his life living out of a suitcase, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a new hire and a potential love interest.
awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 76 wins & 152 nominations.
